        public Player createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String surname,
                           java.sql.Date date,
                           java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String pwd,
                           java.lang.String email,
                           Level level,
                           int score,
                           int correctSequence)
        Create an instance of the Player
        Parameters:
        name - the player's name
        surname - the player's surname
        date - the player's date of birth
        username - the player's authentication username
        pwd - the Player's authentication password
        email - the Player's email
        level - the Player's level
        score - the Player's score
        correctSequence - a number [-4,2] representing the correct(if positive)/wrong(if negative) answer in a row
        Returns:
        Player
